title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: The bug report does not provide an OB statement.
EB: When selecting an open file and choosing 'Open With...' and a different type of editor from the list, the file does not open in the new editor. Instead, the previously opened editor remains active.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example in a new basic project.
2. Create a new file and name it 'test.xml'.
3. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.
5. Observations: The file 'test.xml' does not open with the 'Default Text Editor'. Instead, the scripted resource editor example remains active.

The expected behavior is that the 'test.xml' file opens in a new editor when a different editor type is chosen.
